title: (x) modern sans "merchandising" - Alpha/Alpha Sans {Angel}
content:
Hi, can anyone help me to ident these Font?  
 [http://typophile.com/files/Bild2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905095720/http:/typophile.com/files/Bild2.png "http://typophile.com/files/Bild2.png")

Thanks

author: Peter_H

comments.content:
Jens Gelhaar’s Alpha / Alfa Sans. Not available to buy, see the archives...

[http://www.typophile.com/node/9248](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905095720/http:/www.typophile.com/node/9248 "http://www.typophile.com/node/9248")
Angel, dude, you never fail to impress me. I completely forgot about that one, and there you are… Sheesh.
I have a few favourite designers... Jens, Gareth Hague and Nick Cooke are near the top of my list as they always produce great work.

Wow! thanks Angel, ’preciate it. That means a lot, coming from someone who knows his stuff as you do.

Nick Cooke
